articles.author: Grace Kay
articles.title: Microsoft disses Apple's MacBook keyboard in its latest ad for the Surface Pro 7 - Business Insider - Business Insider
articles.description: "Mac gave me this little bar, but why can't they just give me a whole touchscreen?" a boy asks in the Microsoft Surface ad.
articles.content:
Apple and Microsoft's decades-long rivalry is alive and well, with the PC-maker taking a swipe at Apple's MacBook Touch Bar in its latest advertisement for the Surface Pro 7.
